General.Name: Shen Ma Industry Co Ltd
General.Description: Shenma Industry Co.Ltd engages in the manufacture and sale of chemical and chemical fiber products in China, Europe, the Americas, Asia, and internationally. It offers nylon industrial yarns and cord fabrics; and nylon salt and nylon slices. The company also provides automobile safety airbag wire; adipic acid, 1,6-hexanediamine, cyclohexanol, cyclohexane, nitric acid, and aramid fiber; dipped fabrics; nylon resins and modified engineering plastics; chemical fiber canvas; and paper and wood products, as well as nylon chips. In addition, it offers bisphenol A, PC, flame-retardant fibers, raw liquid dyed yarns, nylon civil yarns, etc. Further, the company engages in the production and sale of airbag filament; technology development, transfer, and promotion of dibasic acid; project investment and financial consulting; production of chemical fiber, polyamide 6 polymerization, and labor insurance clothing; and production and sale of packaging supplies, polyamide film, cable ties and other plastic products, polycarbonate modified materials, and general chemicals, as well as provision of scientific research and technical services. The company was founded in 1993 and is headquartered in Pingdingshan, China. Shenma Industry Co.Ltd is a subsidiary of China Pingmei Shenma Group Co.,Ltd.

1.Name: Mr. Zhen  Liu
1.Title: Sec. of the Board of Directors
